attributes.action: Stop funding cuts to East Anglia Childrens Hospice (EACH)
attributes.additional_details: From personal experience of close friends, EACH has provided not only quality time with their child as they passed but also still 3 years on they are still providing conselling and support to them both.  This kind of charity is invaluable not only to the parents but to the children left behind and will ensure they enjoy their childhood whilst remembering their lost brother or sister.  The government cannot tirvialize the immense need for charities of this type.  Stop the funding cuts!!!!!!!
